projectDescriptor.description: N4JS project for demonstrating the main capabilities of the language through a simple example. After creating the projects each third party npm dependencies used by this example should be installed manually. For doing that one has to open up the 'manifest.n4mf' file in editor and has to install the required dependencies by applying the quick fix (Ctrl+1 on Windows and Linux operating systems and Cmd+1 on MacOS X) on the missing dependnecies.
projectDescriptor.name: n4js.example.tasks

projectDescriptor.description: Test project for the Tasks Example N4JS project. This project is indented to exhibit the runtime and tooling support of testing framework.
projectDescriptor.name: n4js.example.tasks.tests
